document_data.name: ''Belt of Hill Giant Strength''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''belt of hill giant strength''''', also known as a '''''girdle of hill giant strength''''',
document_data.Description: These belts were rather plain-looking in appearance, made of thick leather and metal studs. They were considered among the least powerful of ''[[belt of giant strength|belts of giant strength]].''
document_data.Powers: When worn, the belt imbued the wearer with the strength—albeit not the size or the girth—of a massive [[hill giant]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, one of these belts could be found in [[Ribald Barterman]]'s [[Adventurer Mart]] in [[Athkatla]].
